The claim was made by Mary Burke: a Democratic gubernatorial candidate in Wisconsin, during her campaign for governor.
The claim was made on April 8: 2014, which coincided with National Equal Pay Day proclaimed by President Barack Obama.
The claim stated that in Wisconsin: women earn 80 cents for every dollar a man earns.
The claim was compared to similar claims: such as Kathleen Falk and President Obama, who also referenced pay gaps between men and women.
